title: Ownership Structure of Bright Scholar Education Holdings Ltd

content.text:
The major shareholders of Bright Scholar Education Holdings Ltd are as follows:

1. Fosun International Ltd - Fosun International Ltd is the largest shareholder of the company with a 39.5% ownership stake.

2. Greenwoods Asset Management Ltd - Greenwoods Asset Management Ltd holds a 9.57% ownership stake in the company.

3. BlackRock, Inc. - BlackRock, Inc. is another significant shareholder with an ownership stake of 5.24%.

4. China Structural Reform Fund Corporation Limited - China Structural Reform Fund Corporation Limited owns approximately 3.83% of the company.

5. Vanguard Group, Inc. - Vanguard Group, Inc. holds a 3.71% ownership stake in the company.

Institutional investors play a significant role in Bright Scholar Education Holdings Ltd's ownership structure. Some of the major institutional investors holding shares in the company include:

1. Fidelity Management & Research Company - Fidelity Management & Research Company owns a 3.67% stake in the company.

2. JPMorgan Asset Management (UK) Ltd - JPMorgan Asset Management (UK) Ltd holds a 3.17% ownership stake.

3. Massachusetts Financial Services Co. - Massachusetts Financial Services Co. owns approximately 2.03% of the company.

4. Dimensional Fund Advisors LP - Dimensional Fund Advisors LP holds a 1.85% ownership stake.

5. Wells Fargo & Company - Wells Fargo & Company holds a 1.77% ownership stake in the company.

Insider ownership refers to the ownership stakes held by individuals closely associated with the company, such as executives and board members. As of the latest available data, insider ownership in Bright Scholar Education Holdings Ltd is approximately 6.04%.

news.summary: Bright Scholar Education Holdings Limited ("Bright Scholar," the "Company," "we" or "our") (NYSE: BEDU), a global premier education service company, today announced its unaudited financial results for the first fiscal quarter ended November 30, 2023.

news.headline: Bright Scholar Schedules Unaudited Financial Results for the First Fiscal Quarter of Fiscal 2024 Ended November 30, 2023
news.summary: Bright Scholar Education Holdings Limited ("Bright Scholar," the "Company," "we" or "our") (NYSE: BEDU), a global premier education service company, today announced that it will release its unaudited financial results for the first fiscal quarter of fiscal 2024 ended November 30, 2023, on February 5, 2024, after the US market closes.
